text:
@realDonaldTrump Despite having committed to transferring 2,000 ventilators in military stocks to FEMA and HHS to fight the coronavirus outbreak, the Pentagon has not shipped any of them because the agencies have not asked for them or provided a shipping location.

https://t.co/QJs3qRh3Te
